::Bazooka::

 Seeing Boberton's self sacrifice and the fight between Shredder and the 
other bot Bazooka had little options. He only wished he hade some sort of jet 
pack.
    "Magmatron we could use you down here." Bazooka yelled into his comm. He 
turned and fired opon the second bot (Not Shredder). Still unknowing of his 
name. Firiring all he had at him. Then he ran towards Bobertron.
    "Ohh...crap." Bazooka said. "Shredder I must get Bobertron back to my 
base. Follow me there wearing this. It will protect you alone. If that other 
bot follows you, he will be scrap." Bazooka called into his comm.

______________________________________________________________________
::Magmatron::

    After making sure that Bazooka's comm was always open to him he listened 
to the battle. Very smart Bazooka. He thought to himself. He transformed into 
beast mode and headed off to join the battle.
    He reached there only a little while later. "Scanners identify the bot 
fighting Shredder." He asked of his systems. "Bot known as Wrath. Scanners 
have picked up the signal of a Predacon heading this way."
    "Darn." Magmatron said. "Bazooka get Bobertron to a CR chamber, I'll deal 
with the threats. Magmatron Transform."
    He shifted into his impressave Robot mode. Firing all weapons at Wrath. 
He then used the hidden rocket boster in his feet for a small arial exibit. 
Doing a little spin here and there he fired at Wrath. Floating there he 
waited for the next move.
